title: Regal Kundan and Ruby Antique Choker - Raani Haar
materials: Freshwater Pearls. Features traditional Hyderabadi Polki setting for maximum brilliance.
features: Elaborate circular Kundan settings with concentric rows of Polki diamonds. Features a central pear-shaped pendant with cascading Ruby drops and smaller Polki diamonds. The design echoes Mughal-inspired artistry, perfect for a traditional Telugu bride or a lover of timeless elegance. Handcrafted Nakshi work on the reverse side enhances its antique charm.
colors: Lustrous White (Pearls). A classically regal color palette
occasions: and special celebrations. A statement piece for both traditional Telugu functions and high-end modern events.
description: Authentic Kundan craftsmanship passed down through generations. Features an antique finish that enhances the rich historical appeal. The combination of Polki diamonds and Rubies symbolizes prosperity and love. Durable and designed for heirloom quality, making it a cherished family treasure. Showcases Hyderabadi artistry at its finest, representing unparalleled luxury and cultural significance.
